original: JANSSON, Gustav, Förvaltare, Skoghall, f Gävle 23/12 82 av faktor And J o Margareta Berglund, gm Anna Nyström. Eft slut skolstud anst ss bgkh v Härnäs Bruk, insp v Söderfors Br AB :s brädg- o skeppn.avd o ch f Th Olrogs trävaruskeppn 03, förv v Vifsta-varvs sågvk, hyvl o brädg 07, v Kramfors AB 12, pl.chef v Skoghalls sågvk o bruksförvaltn sed. 19. Komm.flm, led av skol.styr, hälsov.nmd, kristidsnmd, länsprövn.nmd, ordf i Hammarö byggn.nmd, Mellansysslets vägst o ktén f uppf av pensionärshem; styr.led i Karlstads sparbk, vkst led av Hammarö vat-tenvksstyr, v. ordf i Värml l brandkårsfrb o ch f Skoghallsvkns brandkår, förvalt f egnahemsverksamheten. RVO.
translated: JANSSON, Gustav, Administrator, Skoghall, born in Gävle on December 23rd, 1882, son of factor And J and Margareta Berglund, married to Anna Nyström. After completing school, he was employed at Härnäs Bruk, worked as an inspector at Söderfors Br AB's timber and shipbuilding department, and then at Th Olrog's timber shipping in 1903. He became the administrator of Vifsta varv's sawmill, planing mill, and timber yard in 1907, and later worked at Kramfors AB in 1912. He became the plant manager at Skoghall's sawmill and industrial administration in 1919. He served as a municipal council member and was a member of the school board, health committee, wartime committee, county evaluation committee, and chairman of the Hammarö building committee. He also served on the board of directors of Karlstad savings bank, was a development director at Hammarö water management committee, vice chairman of the Värmland firefighters' association, and the leader of Skoghall firefighters. He managed the company's own-home business. Received the Order of Vasa.
